thread.title: Emilia Clarke debuted new hair that’s so different we barely recognized her
thread.title_full: Emilia Clarke debuted new hair that’s so different we barely recognized her

author: Devan McGuinness
title: Emilia Clarke debuted new hair that’s so different we barely recognized her
text:
Emilia Clarke debuted new hair that’s so different we barely recognized her One of our favorite females to watch on TV has to be Daenerys on Game of Thrones because she’s girl power personified. She’s known for her signature bright white, long straight hair and the actress, Emilia Clarke, looks like a totally different person when she’s not wearing the coined wig of her character.
The 30-year-old actress attended a pre-BAFTA party this past weekend and if you had not already been a total super fan of her work, it would be hard to recognize her as the same mother of dragons without her wig. 
When she’s not chillin’ with dragons, she looks like this:
HE WAS SO UP FOR A SELFIE. A part of the Star Wars crew?!! Me?!! 8 million fabulous souls decided to press 'follow' for my page?!!! IS THIS THE REAL LIFE? IS THIS JUST FANTASY?!! Or is this one happy girl getting Christmas early... YOU guys did it. Literally. All of it. Thank you, thank you, thank you. ❤️❤️❤️ #forgivethecheesebutwhenyoufeeltheloveyougottashoutitoutloud 
A video posted by @emilia_clarke on Nov 29, 2016 at 6:25am PST 
So when she showed up to the BAFTA event, we were like WHO DAT?
In place of her long locks, which we’re used to seeing, Clarke showed up with a dark, blunt fringe cut wearing a metallic biker jacket and a semi-sheer maxidress. She looked incredible, but like a different person at the same time.
Getty Images/ David M. Benett Getty Images / GOR She kept her makeup relatively neutral, wearing a thick black liner and nude lip, totally giving us vibes from one of her throne rivals, Cersei.
Getty Images/ David M. Benett We know that if you want to change up your look, the fastest way to do that is to rock some bangs and Clarke proves that she can wear basically any hair style or color and still look like one fierce queen!
